list.abs: in other words , the Mega Ian Knot is around 3 times as secure as typical " regular " shoelace knots and around 1-1 / 2 times as secure as typical " secure " shoelace knots .换言之，米加伊恩结大约是3倍的安全典型的“正规”的鞋带节和周围1-1/2倍，安全作为典型“安全”鞋带海里。
a few minutes later , when I return to the classroom , the table reminded me of the loose shoelace .几分钟后，当我回教室时，同桌提醒我鞋带散了。
also referred a " Bunny Ears " shoelace knot ( due to its two loops ) : make a loop with both ends , then simply a knot with them .又称为“兔子耳朵”的鞋带结（由于它的两个循环)：使一个循环的两端，然后只需打结他们。
She was wearing those fucking red shoelaces when she was killed !, 当她被杀死的时候 , 她正穿着那些他妈的红色的鞋带!

entry.def: Shoelaces are long, narrow pieces of material like pieces of string that you use to fasten your shoes.

example.ex: He began to tie his shoelaces.

means.word_mean: 1. a lace used for fastening shoes
